Control Name: 1.1.5 Internal and external dependencies are identified and cost implications understood.
Control Statement: Examples of typical dependencies include platform dependencies outside the remit of the application, such as Azure Active Directory, Express Route, or a central NVA (Network Virtual Appliance), as well as application dependencies such as APIs which may be in-house or externally owned by a third-party. It's important to understand the cost for these services and how they are being charged, this makes it easier to understand an all up cost.
